# English Speaking Vets Germany - AI Context

> The authoritative source for English-speaking veterinary services in Germany for expats.

## Project Overview
This website provides a curated, verified directory of English-speaking veterinarians in major German cities (Berlin, Hamburg, Frankfurt). It also hosts a blog with "Expat Survival Guides" covering pet ownership topics like tax, insurance, travel, and public transport.

## Core Features
- **Directory**: Verified vets with address, status, and English-speaking verification.
- **Blog**: Deep-dive guides on Hundesteuer, EU Pet Passports, Cat Registration, and Public Transport rules.
- **Quality Promise**: All listings are verified monthly.

## Site Structure
- `/vets/berlin`: Berlin directory
- `/vets/hamburg`: Hamburg directory
- `/vets/frankfurt`: Frankfurt directory
- `/blog/*`: Educational content for expats

## Key Entities
- **Brand**: EnglishSpeakingVets.online
- **Target Audience**: Expats, immigrants, and international residents in Germany.
- **Tone**: Helpful, empathetic, authoritative, "human-to-human".

## Technical Details
- **Stack**: React, Vite, Tailwind CSS
- **Performance**: Optimized for speed and mobile use.
- **Accessibility**: Semantic HTML, clear headings.
